reviewText:
I actually purchased Santa & the three bears for my sister.  She always said that was her favorite show at Christmas time, but channel 5 quit showing it. The first time she watched it she watched it twice because she had not seen it for a few years on TV.

Thank You,
Margaret Illingworth

This is my absolute favorite Christmas program. Until I found it on Amazon, I had spent many years searching for it since it rarely airs on television. Thanks to Amazon, it's once again a part of my holiday tradition.
